message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $1000000. Considering the high demand and limited supply, I propose a starting price of $1500000 for the product.

Thank you for considering my interest in your product. After evaluating its value to me, I believe a fair price would be closer to $1000000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our perspectives.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. While I appreciate your valuation of the product, I must respectfully decline. To ensure a mutually beneficial outcome, I propose a price of $1250000 for the product.

I appreciate your response, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. This price aligns more closely with what I believe it is worth to me and remains within my budget constraints.
I understand your position, Bob. To reach a compromise, I propose a price of $1200000 for the product. This price reflects its value to you while allowing us to move forward with the transaction.
